Package com.flipkart.business

Interface NotificationInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
NotificationOperation
public interface NotificationInterface
Notification logic for sending notifications for multiple events such as 1. Student Registration 2. Registration Approval 3. Fee payment

    • sendNotification

      int sendNotification(NotificationType type, int studentId, ModeOfPayment modeOfPayment, double amount, String cardNumber, String cvv)
      Method to send notification

      type - : type of the notification to be sent
      studentId - : student to be notified
      modeOfPayment - : payment mode used
      amount - : amount
      cardNumber - : card number
      cvv - : cvv
